posts.title: LEGO Voltron Set
posts.content: Keep your home – and the universe – free from evil by building your very own Voltron using this awesome LEGO set. With this 2,321 piece set you’ll be able to construct the five mighty lions that join forces to form an imposing 15 inch tall LEGO Votron.

posts.title: The Clip-On Man Bun
posts.content: Turn yourself into a modern day Fabio without having to grow out your hair by snapping on one of these clip on man buns. Its available in several different colors so that you can ooze with sex appeal to all kinds of women with horrible taste in men.

posts.title: The Cup Holder Couch Pillow
posts.content: Avoid having to physically get up every time you want to wet your whistle or grab the remote by keeping the cup holder couch pillow by your side. It comes with a series of small compartments ideal for cups, mugs, and even the remote control.

posts.title: Tactical Military Gloves
posts.content: Ensure your hands stay injury free the next time you’re exploring the outdoors by gearing up with the tactical military gloves. Originally designed for the armed forces, they’re made to take a beating and feature finger and knuckle impact protection.

posts.title: Digital Art Display
posts.content: Easily bring a museum’s worth of masterpieces into your home using nothing more than this digital art display. This high-tech painting allows you to sift through entire collections on your phone and choose the one you want to display on the dynamic canvas.

posts.title: Obese Statue Of David
posts.content: Have you ever wondered what the Statue of David would look like if it were sculpted recently using what the average sized man looks like today as inspiration? This obese Statue of David sculpture embodies the gluttony, and the abundance of obesity in modern times.

posts.title: Cat Butt Refrigerator Magnets
posts.content: These cat butt refrigerator magnets make the perfect gift for the cat lover who has it all. Each magnet in this six piece set comes styled like the rear-end of a different kitty cat. They’re functional and make great conversation starters when guests come over.

posts.title: Vintage Polaroid Camera
posts.content: Ditch the smartphone and kick it old school by capturing special moments using this vintage Polaroid camera. This Polaroid OneStep camera features a rigid and durable plastic body and utilizes SX-70 integral film so you can instantly print out photos.

posts.title: Conversation Starter Cards
posts.content: Fall in love all over again as you rediscover your spouse’s hopes, worries, and dreams using these conversation starter cards for husbands and wives. Each card features a question and an accompanying verse or quote intended to spark a lively conversation.

posts.title: 2-in-1 Ping Pong Conference Table
posts.content: Keep stress levels at an all time low during the workday with this 2-in-1 ping pong conference table. This versatile conference table opens up at the center to reveal a storage compartment packed with everything you’ll need for you ping pong game.

posts.title: Personalized Family Tree Posters
posts.content: Display your family’s long history in a unique visual way that keeps everything neatly organized using one of these personalized family tree posters. Each poster depicts a large tree that lets catalog every member of your clan as far back as six generations.

posts.title: Gakken Mini Electric Guitar Kit
posts.content: Turn wherever you are into the perfect location for an impromptu jam session with the ultra portable Gakken mini electric guitar kit. This pint-sized electric guitar comes with built-in amplifier and speaker making it the perfect instrument for the musician on-the-go.
